subject: Critical Thinking
title: The Future of Truth in the AI Age
description: A quick win: understand The Future of Truth in the AI Age.

hook.text: AI can now write articles, generate photos, clone voices, & create videos of events that never happened.

buildup.text: Generative AI makes creating convincing false content nearly free & infinitely scalable.

discovery.text: Potential solutions: digital provenance, blockchain verification, and AI-powered detection.

twist.text: Technology alone won't save us. The arms race between generation & detection may be unwinnable.

climax.text: The most important defense: a population trained in critical thinking, source evaluation, and epistemic humility.

punchline.text: AI can fake anything. Critical thinking can't be faked.

quiz.question: What is the most essential long-term defense against AI-generated misinformation?
options: A population trained in critical thinking and source evaluation
